resources.string: OuEstMaVoiture? is an application developped for the P222 subject, for Toulouseâ€™s IT Institute of Technology. This application was developped by Antoine MILHAU and Philippe BAUS, both studens from group S4B. OuEstMaVoiture? Allows the user to save his car location, and to find it back easily. Thank you for using OuEstMaVoiture?
